review: Very simple and easy to use with all our favorite apps!
author: Kristie

review: It seems cool if it worked properly. Most apps don't work or take forever to load & I have awesome internet speed so it's not that. Not sure if I got a dud so will be swapping & will try again, not ready to give up yet!
author: Sarah

review: I completely regret this purchase. I've had repeated problems using both Netflix and Hulu. The YouTube app did not work correctly even once.
author: Melissa Carpenter

review: So far the fire stick has not lived up to expectations. I own the fire TV box and it works great, never freezes, lags or randomly shuts down or restarts apps. The stick on the other hand has been dong this Constantly despite only downloading Netflix and one other small app. The remote seems to lag behind every input. It's only been a few days so will update with any changes but disappointed so far.
author: Mike A

review: luv it!!!!all that i need!! now i have a smart tv 5*
author: Filipa Castanheira

review: love it---use it all the time!
author: FuzzyLogicRiceCooker

review: I purchased two fire sticks and one works well on one of my TV's and the other doesn't work as well.
author: Charles Crumbley

review: Easy to use and works perfectly.
author: Gian Carlos Lo Prete
